response.overview: The plot is the movement of Artemis towards her brother Apollo, who is returning from Space with an inspection to Central Russia. Based on the ancient Slavic division of the universe into Nav, Yav, and Prav, Apollo arrives at the center of YAV. Artemis, in the guise of the Bear, leaves her den - the sanctuary and goes to the place of the Meeting. Landing somewhere in the South Ural steppes, Apollo, in the form of the Five-Legged Wolf, walks reviving spring fields and birch farms towards his sanctuary - to the Apollo colonnade in the Moscow region.
response.title: Russian Stereo

release_dates.note: Spirit Of Fire International Festival Of Cinematographic Debuts
